body: This is a regression, it was working that way in previous versions.

rename.from: `File`>`Persist Session...` should be disabled if it won't do anything useful
rename.to: `File`>`Persist Session...` should be disabled with open session

issue.title: Add open recent menu

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Hi guys!
So I'm almost done with this https://github.com/zaproxy/zaproxy/issues/6735
Just need help with how to change the open recent menu dynamically (when opening or saving a session)

Corresponding help: [#432](https://github.com/zaproxy/zap-core-help/pull/432)

Signed-off-by: Hichem Yagoubi <hichem.yagoubi1@gmail.com>

body: @thc202 If you’ve already figured out what’s needed here feel free to PR it. I haven’t even looked. I just saw this while perusing issues the other day and figured it should be tackled for 2.12.

issue.title: Restore Session title and Persist Session's state

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Properly initialise the view in `ExtensionUiUtils` to have the session changed listener added on hook, which sets the main title to the session's name and controls the state of Persist Session menu/button.
Remove statements no longer needed in `MainMenuBar` that updated the button state, now done in a single method.

Fix #7423.

body: This issue has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
